member.name: F:SwiftStack.Constants.Logo
member.summary: Logo. Thank you https://patorjk.com/software/taag and font Small Slant.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueBroadcaster`1
member.typeparam: Type of message being sent. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueBroadcastReceiver`1
member.typeparam: Type of message being received. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: E:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueBroadcastReceiver`1.MessageReceived
member.summary: Event handler fired when a broadcast message is received.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueConsumer`1
member.typeparam: Type of message being consumed. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: E:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueConsumer`1.MessageReceived
member.summary: Event handler fired when a message is received.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueConsumer`1.Acknowledge(System.UInt64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Acknowledge a message by correlation ID.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueConsumer`1.Reject(System.UInt64,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reject a message by providing a non-acknowledgement (nack).
member.param: Boolean to indicate if the message should be requeued.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IMessageQueueProducer`1
member.typeparam: Type of message being produced. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IncomingMessage`1
member.typeparam: Type of message. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IncomingMessage`1.TimestampUtc
member.summary: Timestamp, in UTC time, when the message was sent.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.IncomingMessage`1.ExpirationUtc
member.summary: Timestamp, in UTC time, when this object should be considered expired. Default is 7 days.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.QueueProperties.Durable
member.summary: Enable or disable durability of the queue. This allows the queue to survive broker restarts by persisting to disk.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.QueueProperties.Exclusive
member.summary: Enable or disable exclusive use of the queue. When enabled, the queue can only be used by one connection, will be deleted when that connection closes, and no other connection can consume from the queue.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.QueueProperties.AutoDelete
member.summary: Enable or disable auto-deletion. When enabled, the queue will be deleted when all consumers have unsubscribed.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqApp.IsRunning
member.summary: Boolean to indicate if the app is running.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqApp.Header
member.summary: Header to include in emitted log messages. Default is [RabbitMqApp].

member.name: M:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqApp.AddBroadcaster``1(SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqBroadcaster{``0})
member.typeparam: Type of object. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqApp.AddResilientBroadcaster``1(SwiftStack.RabbitMq.ResilientRabbitMqBroadcaster{``0})
member.summary: Add a resilient broadcaster. Resilient interfaces include automatic reconnection and store-and-forward message handling with local disk persistence. Resilient interfaces should not be used for large objects or extremely high volume applications.
member.typeparam: Type of object. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqApp.AddBroadcastReceiver``1(SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqBroadcastReceiver{``0})
member.typeparam: Type of object. Must be JSON serializable.

member.summary: Add a resilient broadcast receiver. Resilient interfaces include automatic reconnection and store-and-forward message handling with local disk persistence. Resilient interfaces should not be used for large objects or extremely high volume applications.
member.typeparam: Type of object. Must be JSON serializable.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqApp.AddProducer``1(SwiftStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqProducer{``0})
member.typeparam: Type of object. Must be JSON serializable.

member.summary: Add a resilient producer. Resilient interfaces include automatic reconnection and store-and-forward message handling with local disk persistence. Resilient interfaces should not be used for large objects or extremely high volume applications.

member.summary: Whether the value can be null.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme
member.summary: Defines a security scheme that can be used by the operations.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Type
member.summary: The type of the security scheme. Valid values are "apiKey", "http", "mutualTLS", "oauth2", "openIdConnect". Required.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Description
member.summary: A short description for the security scheme.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Name
member.summary: The name of the header, query or cookie parameter to be used. Required for apiKey type.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.In
member.summary: The location of the API key. Valid values are "query", "header", or "cookie". Required for apiKey type.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Scheme
member.summary: The name of the HTTP Authorization scheme to be used in the Authorization header. Required for http type.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.BearerFormat
member.summary: A hint to the client to identify how the bearer token is formatted.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Flows
member.summary: An object containing configuration information for the flow types supported. Required for oauth2 type.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.OpenIdConnectUrl
member.summary: OpenId Connect URL to discover OAuth2 configuration values. Required for openIdConnect type.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.ApiKey(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an API Key security scheme.
member.param: The name of the header, query or cookie parameter.
The location of the API key ("query", "header", or "cookie").
A short description for the security scheme.
member.returns: A configured API Key security scheme.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Bearer(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Bearer token security scheme.
member.param: A hint to the client to identify how the bearer token is formatted (e.g., "JWT").
A short description for the security scheme.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSecurityScheme.Basic(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Basic authentication security scheme.
member.param: A short description for the security scheme.
member.returns: A configured Basic auth security scheme.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlows
member.summary: Allows configuration of the supported OAuth Flows.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlows.Implicit
member.summary: Configuration for the OAuth Implicit flow.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlows.Password
member.summary: Configuration for the OAuth Resource Owner Password flow.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlows.ClientCredentials
member.summary: Configuration for the OAuth Client Credentials flow.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlows.AuthorizationCode
member.summary: Configuration for the OAuth Authorization Code flow.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlow
member.summary: Configuration details for a supported OAuth Flow.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlow.AuthorizationUrl
member.summary: The authorization URL to be used for this flow. Required for implicit and authorizationCode flows.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlow.TokenUrl
member.summary: The token URL to be used for this flow. Required for password, clientCredentials and authorizationCode flows.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlow.RefreshUrl
member.summary: The URL to be used for obtaining refresh tokens.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiOAuthFlow.Scopes
member.summary: The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme. Required.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServer.Url
member.summary: A URL to the target host. Required.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServer.Description
member.summary: An optional string describing the host designated by the URL.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServer.Variables
member.summary: A map between a variable name and its value used for substitution in the server's URL template.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServer.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a server with the specified values.
member.param: A URL to the target host.
An optional string describing the host designated by the URL.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServerVariable
member.summary: An object representing a Server Variable for server URL template substitution.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServerVariable.Default
member.summary: The default value to use for substitution, which SHALL be sent if an alternate value is not supplied. Required.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServerVariable.Description
member.summary: An optional description for the server variable.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServerVariable.Enum
member.summary: An enumeration of string values to be used if the substitution options are from a limited set.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiServerVariable.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a server variable with the specified default value.
member.param: The default value to use for substitution.
An optional description for the server variable.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings
member.summary: OpenAPI configuration settings for the API.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.EnableOpenApi
member.summary: Whether to enable OpenAPI document generation and the OpenAPI JSON endpoint. When set to false, the OpenAPI document endpoint will not be registered and Swagger UI will also be disabled regardless of the EnableSwaggerUi setting. Default is true.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.Servers
member.summary: An array of Server Objects, which provide connectivity information to a target server.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.Tags
member.summary: A list of tags used by the specification with additional metadata.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.SecuritySchemes
member.summary: A map of security schemes that can be used across the specification.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.DocumentPath
member.summary: The path at which the OpenAPI JSON document will be served. Default is "/openapi.json".

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.SwaggerUiPath
member.summary: The path at which the Swagger UI will be served. Default is "/swagger".

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.EnableSwaggerUi
member.summary: Whether to enable the Swagger UI. Default is true.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.IncludeUnauthenticatedRoutes
member.summary: Whether to include unauthenticated routes in the documentation. Default is true.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.IncludeAuthenticatedRoutes
member.summary: Whether to include authenticated routes in the documentation. Default is true.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.SwaggerUiVersion
member.summary: The version of Swagger UI to use. Default is "5.11.0".

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.Security
member.summary: A security requirement that applies to all operations unless overridden.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates OpenAPI settings with the specified title and version.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiTag
member.summary: Adds metadata to a single tag that is used by the Operation Object.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiTag.Name
member.summary: The name of the tag. Required.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiTag.Description
member.summary: A short description for the tag.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiTag.ExternalDocs
member.summary: Additional external documentation for this tag.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiTag.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a tag with the specified values.
member.param: A short description for the tag.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.ParameterLocation
member.summary: Specifies the location of a parameter in an HTTP request.

member.name: F:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.ParameterLocation.Path
member.summary: Parameter is part of the URL path (e.g., /users/{id}).

member.name: F:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.ParameterLocation.Query
member.summary: Parameter is in the query string (e.g., ?page=1).

member.name: F:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.ParameterLocation.Header
member.summary: Parameter is in the request headers.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RestAppExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for RestApp to enable OpenAPI/Swagger support.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RestAppExtensions.UseOpenApi(SwiftStack.Rest.RestApp,System.Action{SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiSettings})
member.summary: Enables OpenAPI documentation and Swagger UI for the REST application.
member.param: Optional action to configure OpenAPI settings.
member.returns: The REST application for method chaining.

member.name: T:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RouteInfo
member.summary: Extended route information including OpenAPI metadata. Used internally to track route registration for OpenAPI document generation.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RouteInfo.RequestBodyType
member.summary: Request body type for routes that accept a body (POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE). Null for routes without a request body.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RouteInfo.ResponseType
member.summary: Response type for the route. Null if not explicitly specified.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RouteInfo.OpenApiMetadata
member.summary: OpenAPI documentation metadata for the route. May be null if no explicit documentation was provided.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.RouteInfo.#ctor(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpMethod,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Type,System.Type,SwiftStack.Rest.OpenApi.OpenApiRouteMetadata)
member.summary: Instantiates route info with the specified values.

member.summary: Generates the HTML for the Swagger UI page.
member.param: The URL to the OpenAPI JSON document.
The version of Swagger UI to use. Default is "5.11.0".
member.returns: The HTML content for the Swagger UI page.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.SwiftStackException.StatusCode
member.summary: HTTP status code that corresponds to the Result.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.IsRunning
member.summary: Boolean to indicate if the app is running.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.Header
member.summary: Header to include in emitted log messages. Default is [RestApp].

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.QuietStartup
member.summary: Set to true to disable log messages on startup.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.OnConnection
member.summary: Event to fire when a client connects.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.OnDisconnection
member.summary: Event to fire when a client disconnects.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.DefaultRoute
member.summary: Default route, used when no matching route handler is found.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.NotFoundRoute
member.summary: Not found route, used when a message specifies a route that doesn't exist. If not set, falls back to DefaultRoute.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.SendExceptionMessagesToClient
member.summary: When true and no ExceptionRoute is set, sends a default error message to the client. Default is false for backward compatibility.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsApp.IncludeExceptionDetailsInClientMessages
member.summary: When true, includes exception details in default error messages sent to clients. Only applies when SendExceptionMessagesToClient is true and no ExceptionRoute is set. Default is false for security.

member.name: P:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsMessage.Route
member.summary: Route by which the message should be handled.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsMessage.SetWebsocketServer(WatsonWebsocket.WatsonWsServer)
member.summary: Set the WebSocket server reference for response helper methods. This is typically called internally by WebsocketsApp.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsMessage.RespondAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Send a response back to the client that sent this message.
member.param: The response to send. Can be a string or an object that will be serialized to JSON.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsMessage.RespondAsync(WatsonWebsocket.WatsonWsServer,System.Object)
member.summary: Send a response back to the client that sent this message, using a custom WebSocket server instance.

member.summary: Get the message data as a UTF-8 string.

member.name: M:SwiftStack.Websockets.WebsocketsMessage.DataAsBytes
